column1: Following #InternationalReligiousFreedomDay yesterday join me tonight at 7pm as I speak with the @DioceseofJoliet Justice & Peace Office to discuss the importance of International Religous Freedom and explore its current threats.  You can register here: https://t.co/KNn7vFY6Ln https://t.co/NX8V4xnmFD
Join us on Facebook Live for a message at 2:30 PM CST https://t.co/kvZp9SngLU
Attention Cook County Voters!  Some polling places will remain open until 8 pm so stay in line if you are waiting to vote.  Check for your polling place here: https://t.co/dAGtTxLI6H
Polls are open until 7:00! Thanks for everyone’s support. Stay safe out there! #CommonSense2020 #IL03 https://t.co/nAAKcqsHDN
Before you head out and vote just watch this... https://t.co/QR3xOj0H4V
We are keeping it safe but still working to turn out the vote tonight from all of our campaign offices.  Cannot thank our volunteers enough !  Let’s Do This !!  #IL03 #GOTV https://t.co/p0tVnv72GR
Be sure to check in on your family & friends and get a plan together to get to the polls!  If you need to locate your polling place go to https://t.co/Dmv99ebDZi https://t.co/Hd6eDvCVNL

In light of the public health crisis we face regarding the spread of COVID-19 and after careful consideration the Congressman’s election night event is being cancelled.  As always thank you for your support.  Be safe and take care of each other. https://t.co/aLRjOljat5
Marie Newman's health care plan is Extreme. It would take working families in the Wrong Direction. https://t.co/RnZ8dqqbBk

Thx @chicagotribune! Don’t forget to vote on March 17! #IL03   “Lipinski still has his workhorse energy which benefits all of his constituents. He’s a moderate on most issues w/ a bipartisan outlook. Taxpayers put Lipinski on the November ballot.”  https://t.co/uj68vFRJTy
Marie Newman's health care plan is Extreme. It would take working families in the Wrong Direction. https://t.co/oIxai9cmdE

Long time Garfield Ridge resident Al Cacciottolo talks about the traffic headaches in the community and how the overpass/underpass at the railroad crossing near 63rd and Harlem will improve conditions for drivers. https://t.co/PASfK6wsxU

Election authorities are recommending that people use the Early Voting sites today and tomorrow. Find yours using the links below.  Chicago -> https://t.co/zE9c1bJXN6 Suburban Cook -> https://t.co/7S0VEkVGEa DuPage -> https://t.co/fd5dmhRsVl Will -> https://t.co/Xa5xfcJua4 https://t.co/MUgClZETZ1

One of the best parts of my job is meeting #veterans like Bill Molony who fought bravely for our country. Bill was exposed to Agent Orange in Vietnam but had trouble getting his VA benefits. It was my privilege to help Bill get the medical care he rightly deserves. #IL03 https://t.co/7TbtjlmrzV

Had a busy day talking to voters in the 23rd Ward and attending @Local150’s very abbreviated Archer Ave. St. Patrick’s Day Parade where we made the best of it in chilly weather. 3 days until Election Day. Thanks again to all my supporters. Stay safe and wash those hands! #IL03 https://t.co/K5C5rClbzp

Great seeing everyone at the fish fries in Lockport and at SS. Cyril & Methodius Parish in Lemont. Don’t forget to wash your hands repeatedly to help prevent the spread of coronavirus and make sure you stay home if you’re sick. https://t.co/Z6XUMLDD0X

When it was discovered that Sterigenics was releasing mass amounts of a known carcinogen into the air over IL-03 something had to be done. Congressman stepped up and worked to stop Sterigenics from continuing to do so. #IL03 https://t.co/hJde2o2Z8E

“Lipinski is a man of integrity. He’s earned every re-election. He represents his constituents well.” Those are the Daily Southtown’s unbiased words. Don’t believe @Marie4Congress. She’ll stop at nothing to distort the record. Learn about Marie’s lies ⬇️ https://t.co/5cI1eyGnh1

Cmdr. Paul Bauer was a dedicated father husband police officer & public servant. He paid the ultimate sacrifice trying to keep our streets safe & his legacy will never be forgotten. I hope today’s verdict helps brings closure to his loved ones. Justice was served. https://t.co/0C00M57AJu
https://t.co/8TdnKz7M4X

When I voted today I cast my ballot for @JoeBiden.  Former VP Biden has demonstrated commonsense leadership that has gotten things done throughout his decades of public service.  He can unite our party and provide the leadership we need.  #Dems #Unite https://t.co/NURK8XUnpp

Marie Newman's socialist ideology and proposed tax hikes might be popular with her coastal elite friends but not with the working families in the Third District. We value hard work and enterprise not government overreach and taxation into oblivion. #il03 https://t.co/oiLP0aCz0Q
https://t.co/jBHnqRSMhq
https://t.co/BBjwcuRdmi

The Congressman was up and at it early this morning greeting commuters and working to get out the vote in Romeoville and Lockport.  Let’s finish this race strong and support commonsense leadership when we need it most.  #vote #IL03 https://t.co/JJckGTWyJy
No one likes a sore loser. We can do better than Marie Newman. #IL03 #Vote2020 #Election2020 https://t.co/q7hjAevCRq

So how will Marie Newman's tax raising Medicare for All plan work? Let's hear her explain... #il03 https://t.co/ShjEkLhoxN

While Dan fights in DC for practical solutions Marie Newman is proposing an energy plan that would triple ALL our federal taxes to the tune of $91 TRILLION and a healthcare plan that would require the doubling of ALL federal taxes. #IL03 #Vote2020 https://t.co/HH0H7UZ3Lu

Team Lipinski is taking it to the streets! Great to be with Ald. Silvana Tibares and so many supporters in the 23rd Ward to canvass meet some wonderful residents and get fired up in the home stretch!! #IL03 https://t.co/HdkN9Tr2is

Tune in to #ChicagoTonight on @wttw at 7pm for the final debate in the #IL03 Congressional race. Watch Congressman Lipinski face off with his opponents and make the best case for his re-election campaign. #Vote2020 #Election2020
Lipinski is someone who rolls up his sleeves and gets things done. - Chicago Tribune https://t.co/AsTGdj5n5q

Stopped at St John Fisher's St Baldrick's Supper this weekend. It was inspiring to see so many shaved heads running around the event. I even ran into one of my old St Syms classmates Brian Carmody. https://t.co/ecfODm32EE
https://t.co/mWENElgyqp

Sen. Hastings sure knows how to pack a room. Always a great time his annual St. Patrick's Day Dinner in Orland Hills watching the Irish dancers chatting with candidates and meeting new people. Thanks to the Hastings family for all their support over the years. https://t.co/6SsO4iKD6g
Check out the Congressman's appearance on Flannery Fired Up!  Sorting fact from fiction and bringing important updates as we gear up for election day.    https://t.co/ok2HGJaei5

The Affordable Care Act has many provisions that help working families including coverage protections for people with pre-existing conditions. Marie Newman wants to throw that all away and switch to a government-run plan that would raise taxes on the middle class. https://t.co/rbUjZLODaA

The parishes of IL03 are amazing places of worship and a rich reflection of our communities.  It was great to stop at St. Cajetan's Saturday to meet so many wonderful families and celebrate the season at the annual Irish Fest. https://t.co/XjLzgfRyQw

Our opponents rely on misleading the good people of #IL03 to gain votes. These are the type of desperate tactics that have led to our country's partisan gridlock. We need a problem solver not a liar representing #IL03. We need Dan!  https://t.co/2C7FYqB0sq

We had 150 people out canvassing this past weekend. Thx to my friends in labor who helped get the word out about our fight for working families. We got your back. #UnionStrong @BMWEDIBT @CRCCarpenters @LiUNAchicago @Teamsters @iptleg #BLET #sprinklerfitters #IL03 #commonsense2020 https://t.co/tlpKdYnFMU

Spent the rainy morning out at the Palos Park Metra station today reminding the local riders to get in and vote! If you haven’t made your plans to vote yet check out our website and find your local polling place. Early voting is going on now!  https://t.co/lqmYjKcXcT https://t.co/1VokJOYAmz

Happy #InternationalWomensDay! I’ve been surrounded by so many accomplished women in my life. My mother earned a law degree later in life & my sister has a successful law practice. My wife Judy is a standout actuary. I’m proud to stand up for workplace #equality for all women! 💪🏻 https://t.co/mYYbQzdKQG

You know St Patrick’s Day is almost here when the @ReillyOakLawn soda bread contest arrives.  More than 120 entries this year.  Congrats  to the winners!  And we got to meet the @StPatsParadeChi Queen 🍀💚🍻🍀 https://t.co/B4v3rlXcqJ

North Beverly! Thank you to all my friends old & new who came out last night to show your support. You really know how to make a guy feel welcomed. Special thanks to Jim & Colleen Coulas for opening their lovely home to us. See everyone next week at the Southside Irish Parade! ☘️ https://t.co/3LuL2izTNE
The St Christina Fish Fries are always a blast! I’m amazed to see how tight knit the Mt Greenwood community is and always has been. Thanks for having me! @StChristinaScl #IL03 https://t.co/Nw0xFKuHzM

Our healthcare system has serious problems that demand serious solutions and are nothing to joke about. That’s why we need Congressman Lipinski to continue fighting for us. Vote for commonsense solutions today! https://t.co/Lc1Jjm104t

I had a great meet & greet at Barraco's in Mt. Greenwood yesterday. The room was packed and it was a pleasure to share the stage with my hosts @mattoshea19 @Jerry__Joyce Sheriff Mike Sheahan and Jim “Skinny” Sheahan. Thanks to everyone who came out to show your support! #IL03 https://t.co/rEabQ8l3GR

No Show Newman... Marie was nowhere to be found this morning as the Congressman tackled the late breaking issues in the race & sorted out the real facts from Marie’s fiction with @PoliticalEditor Mike Flannery on #FlanneryFiredUp.  Where’s Marie ? https://t.co/oTy6YembRV
Congrats to the @StRitaFootball 12th Man Raffle Winners! @StRitaAthletics https://t.co/eOl2NdUcAf

Stopped by McNallys on Western last night to congratulate Mike Cummings and his #CPD promotion class on getting the nod as Sergaents. It's great knowing what men of character we have protecting us in #IL03. Congrats to all the recent @Chicago_Police promotes! https://t.co/ohn0vRRxpE
Special thanks to Coach Kuska for the invite! Spent my Fridays in high school watching Rita football. It was my honor to be involved... Go Mustangs! https://t.co/vYBE2wreaN

Seniors are struggling to pay for the astronomical costs of healthcare and prescription drugs. We need a healthcare plan that protects Medicare for seniors not one that dismantles it and raises everyone’s taxes. #il03 #vote2020 https://t.co/gir86genWF

Today we celebrate Casimir Pulaski Day. Pulaski was a great Polish leader who fought for American freedom in the Revolutionary War. As a proud Polish-American Dan fights for the Polish community. The Polish community in #IL03 is strong and we value their many contributions. https://t.co/w7Hku3O0Z4
